relation: Darrow - #99 While the Mighty Bear may not appear dangerous, don't be fooled. Under both of its smiles is something much more sinister.
Darrow1 - #01 Although the Mighty Bear is commonly known for its might, few are aware of its secondary name: Sucker Punching Bear. They are also known to cheat at Go Fish.
Darrow1 - #02 With Ness and Paula a bit worked over, a refresher is in order. Luckily for them both, a plot device just happens to be around the corner! Unfortunately, Mondo Mole is not far behind.
Darrow1 - #03 Mondo Mole's eyesight is pretty bad, but his singing is even worse. Of course, once this is over, he'll be singing...a different tune. Ho ho.

Darrow1 - #04 Ness and Paula both attempt to burn Mondo Mole, but his tough body is too thick to take much damage. While moles are weak to whack-a hammers, unfortunately, they don't take much damage from PSI.
